Title: Riyadh & Jeddah Discovery Tradition & Charm
Description: Experience the best of Saudi Arabia with this captivating 5-day journey through its two most iconic cities. Begin in Riyadh, the dynamic capital rich with cultural heritage, historic forts, and vibrant souqs. Then, fly to Jeddah—known as the Jewel of the Red Sea—where the charm of Old Town, coastal beauty, and the Corniche await. This package offers a perfect balance of history, leisure, and modern Saudi flair.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights Accommodation at the 4* hotel with breakfast.","Airport Transfers (Arrival and Departure).","Half-day RIYADH city tour in English.","Half-day JEDDAH area tour in English."]

Title: Dahab
Inclusions: [" 3-night hotel accommodation per person."," Breakfast included."]

Title: 4-Days Nile Cruise: Aswan to Luxor Discovery
Description: Sail along the legendary Nile River and discover Egypt’s timeless wonders on a 4-day cruise from Aswan to Luxor. Explore iconic landmarks such as the High Dam, Philae Temple, Kom Ombo, and Edfu. Continue to Luxor to marvel at the grandeur of Karnak, Luxor Temple, and the Valley of the Kings.
Inclusions: ["3 nights accommodation 5★ cruise","Full board basis (without drinks)","Round trip transfer: From Aswan train station → cruise & from cruise → Luxor train station","Sightseeing package including : •\t- Aswan: High Dam, Philae Temple •\t- Kom Ombo Temple •\t- Edfu Temple •\t- Luxor: Karnak Temple & Luxor Temple, Valley of the Kings, Hatshepsut Temple, Colossi of Memnon"]

Title: Benelux Grand Tour By Rail
Description:
Amsterdam – Brussels – Luxembourg
Explore the best of Northern Europe in one seamless journey. This 8-night rail tour takes you through the cultural treasures and scenic landscapes of the Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg. From the charming canals of Amsterdam to the medieval towns of Bruges and Ghent, and the fairytale charm of Luxembourg, this tour is a perfect blend of art, history, and discovery. Travel in comfort by train while enjoying centrally located 4-star hotels and guided sightseeing tours with expert multilingual guides.
Inclusions: ["8 Nights Accommodation at the 4* hotel with breakfast.","Rail transportation from Amsterdam to Brussels and from Brussels to Luxembourg.","Panoramic circle tour of Amsterdam - 2hrs (visit the Rijksmuseum or the Van Gogh Museum and a 1 hour canal cruise with a separate open-date ticket is included).","Half-day Windmills and Edam excursion (4hrs).","City tour of Brussels (possibility to visit the Museum of Fine Arts).","Full day excursion to the art cities of Ghent and Bruges.","Hop on Hop off city tour of Luxembourg.","Guided city tours and excursions with professional English-speaking guides.","Entrance fees for included attractions.","Hotel taxes and service charges."]

Title: Jeddah Escape Heritage, Coastline & Culture
Description: Discover the charm and coastal elegance of Jeddah, the Jewel of the Red Sea, on this immersive 4-day getaway. Explore the historic lanes of Al-Balad, stroll along the scenic Corniche, and dive into the city’s rich cultural heritage. Then, unwind with a full day of sun and sea at a private beach club on the Red Sea’s pristine shoreline. This package blends authentic Saudi history with modern leisure for a truly unforgettable escape.
Inclusions: ["3 Nights Accommodation at the 4* hotel with breakfast.","Airport Transfers (Arrival and Departure).","Half-day Jeddah City Tour with English-speaking guide.","Full day Obhur & Beach.","Local VAT Included."]

Title: Grand Turkish Escape – Istanbul, Bursa & Yalova
Description: Discover the diverse charms of Türkiye on this unforgettable 8-day journey through Istanbul, Bursa, and Yalova. Begin in Istanbul, where East meets West across the iconic Bosphorus. Continue to Bursa to explore Ottoman heritage and mountain scenery, then unwind in the thermal waters of Yalova. With a blend of culture, nature, history, and wellness, this tour offers the perfect mix for every kind of traveler.
Inclusions: ["7 Nights Accommodation at the 3* hotel with breakfast.","Round Transfer Airport.","Half Day Istanbul City Tour.","Full Day Bursa Cable Car Tour with Lunch.","Full Day Yalova Thermal Tour with Lunch.","Half Day Bosphorus Cruise Tour.","Transfers between cities."]

Title: Istanbul & Cappadocia – A Journey Through Time & Landscape
Description: Uncover the captivating contrasts of Turkey on this 5-day journey through its two most iconic regions. Begin in Istanbul, where centuries-old empires left behind grand mosques, palaces, and bustling bazaars. Cruise the Bosphorus where Europe meets Asia. Then, journey to Cappadocia’s surreal landscapes—wander through colorful valleys, explore ancient cave churches, and descend into hidden underground cities. This package perfectly blends vibrant city life, rich history, and natural wonders for an unforgettable escape.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights Accommodation: 2 nights at a 3* hotel in Istanbul with breakfast and 2 nights at a 4* hotel in Cappadocia on a half-board basis.(4 Breakfasts, 2 Dinners, 2 Lunches).","Arrival airport transfer from Istanbul NEW airport.","Domestic flight ticket from Istanbul to Cappadocia.","Domestic flight tickets from Cappadocia to Istanbul.","Full Day Istanbul City tour (Seat-In-Coach).","Half Day Bosphorus Cruise Tour (Seat-In-Coach).","Full Day South Cappadocia Tour (Seat-In-Coach).","All entrance fees mentioned in the itinerary.","Transportation in a fully air - conditioned, non - smoking coach.","Professional English - speaking tour guides."]

Title: Baku

Title: Zanzibar Magic
Description: Discover the magic of Zanzibar on a 6-day / 5-night journey that combines white sandy beaches, turquoise waters, and unique cultural experiences. Explore the historic charm of Stone Town, visit Prison Island with its giant tortoises, enjoy a snorkeling adventure at Mnemba Atoll, and encounter dolphins in the Indian Ocean. Don’t miss the famous Jozani Forest with its rare red colobus monkeys and an aromatic spice tour. A perfect blend of relaxation, nature, and culture in an unforgettable tropical paradise.
Inclusions: ["5 Night accommodation in a hotel with breakfast","Airport pick-up and drop-off","All mentioned excursions (Stone Town, Prison Island, Mnemba Atoll, Dolphin Trip, Jozani Forest, Spice Garden)","Seafood lunch & drinks on Prison Island day","Professional tour guide & snorkeling equipment"]

Title: Let The Sea Set You Free – Hurghada
Description: Enjoy a relaxing summer holiday on the Red Sea with a 4-night all-inclusive stay at a 4-star hotel. The package includes accommodation, meals, drinks, and snacks, with optional activities such as snorkeling at Giftun Island, desert safari, water parks, and shopping tours.
Inclusions: ["4-Night stay at a 4-star hotel.","All-inclusive system (accommodation + meals + drinks + snacks).","First child up to 6 years stays free"]

Title: Red Sea Getaway
Description: Enjoy a 5-day / 4-night summer holiday in Hurghada on the stunning shores of the Red Sea. The trip combines beach relaxation with exciting activities such as snorkeling and diving, desert safaris, shopping, and waterparks. Whether you are seeking relaxation or adventure, Hurghada is the perfect destination for you and your family.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights’ accommodation in a 3-star hotel","Daily breakfast and dinner","First child up to 6 years stays free"]

Title: Sea & Adventure.. Sharm El Sheikh
Description: Discover the magic of Sharm El Sheikh, the ultimate Red Sea destination where golden beaches meet thrilling sea and desert adventures. On this trip, you’ll enjoy a unique blend of beachside relaxation, breathtaking snorkeling trips in Ras Mohammed National Park or Tiran Island, and vibrant evenings at SOHO Square, surrounded by lively entertainment. For adventure seekers, a desert safari and a Bedouin dinner under the stars will turn your holiday into unforgettable memories.  Sharm El Sheikh is the perfect summer getaway, offering the ideal mix of relaxation, adventure, and cultural experiences.
Inclusions: ["3 Night stay at a 4-star hote","Half-board meals (Breakfast & Dinner)","First child up to 12 years free of charge"]

Title: Maldives Honeymoon Escape – 4 Days / 3 Nights
Description: Celebrate love in the heart of paradise with our Maldives Honeymoon Escape. Enjoy a luxurious 4-day retreat surrounded by turquoise lagoons and pristine white beaches. Stay in an elegant 5-star resort on a Half Board basis, savor romantic dinners, and unwind with a soothing couple’s massage. Whether you choose to relax under the sun or explore the vibrant marine life, this getaway offers the perfect blend of relaxation, romance, and tropical bliss.
Inclusions: ["3 Nights stay.","Round-trip transportation","Half Board basis (Breakfast & Dinner).","All service charges & taxes.","One time of 30-minute massages"]

Title: Marsa Alam Magic
Description:
Escape the hustle and enjoy the beauty of the Red Sea in Marsa Alam.
This package is designed for sea and nature lovers, with rare coral reefs, sea turtles in Abu Dabbab, and thrilling desert adventures at sunset. Enjoy a unique atmosphere, comfortable stay, and a fully all-inclusive plan with meals and drinks.
Inclusions: ["3 Night stay at a 3-star hotel","All-inclusive plan (meals + drinks)","First child up to 6 years stays free"]

Title: MUSCAT & WAHIBA SANDS ESCAPE – 5 DAYS / 4 NIGHTS
Description: Discover the charm of Oman with this 5-day journey combining Muscat’s cultural landmarks, a scenic coastal drive, and the golden dunes of Wahiba Sands. Explore grand mosques, bustling souks, natural wonders, and enjoy an unforgettable desert adventure before returning to Muscat.
Inclusions: ["3 nights’ accommodation in Muscat (BB)","1 night’s accommodation in Wahiba Sands Desert (HB)","Private airport transfers","Sightseeing tours as per program by private 4WD with local English-speaking guide","3-hour dolphin watching & snorkeling tour by speedboat (SIC) (incl. hotel pick-up/drop-off, snorkeling gear, refreshments)","Entry fees to Bait Al Zubair Museum & Sur Dhow Factory","Bottled water provided during tours & transfers"]

Title: Experience WTM London 2025
Description: Join travel professionals from around the world at WTM London 2025, one of the most influential events in the global travel and tourism industry. Enjoy a comfortable 4-day stay in the heart of London as you attend exhibitions, meet industry leaders, and discover new business opportunities. Beyond the event, take time to explore London’s world-famous landmarks, vibrant culture, and dynamic atmosphere. This package offers the perfect blend of professional networking and unforgettable city experiences.
Inclusions: ["3 nights’ accommodation at selected hotel (or similar)","Room Only basis (accommodation only)","All taxes and service charges"]

Title: Cyprus Escape – Beaches, History & Adventure
Description: Discover the magic of Cyprus with a 5-day / 4-night program that perfectly blends stunning beaches, rich history, and the warm Mediterranean spirit. Your journey begins in Larnaca, where you’ll stroll along the beautiful seafront promenade and visit landmarks such as St. Lazarus Church or Hala Sultan Tekke. Continue with an excursion to Ayia Napa, famous for its turquoise Nissi Beach, enchanting Sea Caves, and the romantic Love Bridge. On Day 3, explore Nicosia, the world’s last divided capital, with its old markets and historic streets. The following day takes you south to Limassol and Paphos, where you’ll marvel at Aphrodite’s Rock, ancient Roman ruins, and the vibrant marina, with the option to enjoy a turtle-watching trip in the sea. On your final day, indulge in shopping, visit the famous Salt Lake, or relax at Mackenzie Beach before your departure.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights hotel accommodation with breakfast","Airport transfers (arrival & departure)"]

Title: Taba Getaway Package – 4 Days / 3 Nights
Description: Escape to the peaceful shores of Taba for a 4-day getaway filled with sunshine, crystal-clear waters, and total relaxation. Stay at a cozy Red Sea resort on a Soft All-Inclusive basis, where you can enjoy delicious meals, refreshing drinks, and stunning sea views. Spend your days lounging by the beach or exploring optional adventures like boat trips to Pharaoh’s Island, desert safaris, or a magical Bedouin dinner under the stars. The perfect retreat for couples, families, or anyone seeking serenity by the sea.
Inclusions: ["Hotel stay on SAI basis","Taxes & service charges"]

Title: kuala lumpur & langkawi.

Not applicable ."]

Title: Italian Dream Journey
Description: Discover the beauty of Italy on an enchanting 8-day / 7-night journey that takes you through its most iconic cities. Your adventure begins in Rome, the Eternal City, home to the greatest treasures of Roman history and ancient landmarks – from the Colosseum to the Trevi Fountain and the lively Piazza Navona. You’ll then continue to Florence, the cradle of the Renaissance, where art and architecture come together in masterpieces like the magnificent Duomo, Piazza della Signoria, and the famous Ponte Vecchio bridge. Finally, your journey leads you to Venice, the dreamy city of canals, where gondolas glide through romantic waterways and the charm of St. Mark’s Square captures the essence of Italian romance.
Inclusions: ["3 Nights in Rome with breakfast","2 Nights in Florence with breakfast","2 Nights in Venice with breakfast","24-Hour hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour in Rome (Multilingual)","Guided group walking tour in Florence (English-speaking guide)","Guided group walking tour in Venice (English-speaking guide)","2nd Class train tickets (Rome – Florence – Venice)"]

Title: Phuket Holiday Package – 6 Days / 5 Nights
Description: Escape to Phuket for 6 days of luxury and adventure! Stay in 5-star resorts, explore the stunning Phi Phi Islands, James Bond Island, and enjoy unforgettable sunsets, shopping, and Thai culture.  A perfect blend of relaxation and discovery.
Inclusions: ["5 nights in 5-star hotels","Daily breakfast","Tours & excursions (except optional ones).","Airport pick-up & drop-off"]

Title: Riyadh Heritage & Desert Adventure
Description: Uncover the rich cultural heritage and thrilling natural beauty of Saudi Arabia’s capital in this immersive 5-day Riyadh experience. From historic souqs and ancient forts to traditional villages and sweeping desert landscapes, this package blends the best of history, adventure, and modern comfort. Discover Riyadh’s soul, travel to the timeless village of Ushaiqer, and end with a thrilling desert safari under the Arabian stars.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights Accommodation at the 5* hotel with breakfast.","Airport Transfers (Arrival and Departure).","Half-day Riyadh City Tour.","Full Day Ushayger Tour with Lunch.","Desert Safari Tour.","English-speaking guide.","Local VAT Included."]

Title: Silk Way Travel – Azerbaijan, Georgia & Armenia
Description: Baku – Sheki – Tbilisi – Kazbegi – Yerevan – Garni – Geghard, Discover the heart of the Caucasus on this immersive journey through Azerbaijan, Georgia, and Armenia. From modern marvels in Baku to the serene monasteries of Armenia, explore ancient trade routes, UNESCO World Heritage Sites, dramatic mountains, and rich culinary traditions. A true cultural mosaic, this tour reveals the beauty, history, and warm hospitality of the region.
Inclusions: ["11 Nights Accommodation at the hotel with breakfast.","Airport Transfers (Arrival and Departure).","Comfortable transport as per program during the excursions.","English speaking guide.","Entrance fees to all mentioned sights.","A bottle of water per person per day.","4X4 cars in Kazbegi.","Wine tasting in Georgia.","Lake Sevan boat cruise in Armenia.","Lavash baking experience in Armenia."]

Title: Riyadh, Jeddah & Abha Heritage
Description: Embark on a remarkable 5-day journey through three of Saudi Arabia’s most captivating cities. Begin in Riyadh, the Kingdom’s vibrant capital, where history and modernity meet. Then escape to the misty highlands of Abha, home to stunning mountain views, cultural gems, and cool weather. Conclude your adventure in Jeddah, the coastal gateway to the Red Sea, where heritage architecture and seaside charm create unforgettable memories. This package blends culture, nature, and urban exploration for a truly enriching experience.
Inclusions: ["4 Nights Accommodation at the 4* hotel with breakfast.","Airport Transfers (Arrival and Departure).","Riyadh City Tour.","Abha City Tour.","Jeddah City Tour.","English-speaking guide.","Local VAT Included."]

Title: The Majestic Trio Gems – Malaysia
Description: Embark on a captivating journey through Malaysia’s urban splendor and natural wonders with our Langkawi, Penang, and Kuala Lumpur tours. Begin your adventure in Langkawi, an archipelago of 99 islands boasting pristine beaches and lush rainforests. Next, discover Penang, the cultural heartland, where heritage and modernity blend seamlessly. Conclude in Kuala Lumpur, the vibrant capital city that pulses with life, iconic skyscrapers, and culinary delights. This tour promises an unforgettable exploration of Malaysia’s diversity, from tranquil landscapes to bustling cityscapes.
Inclusions: ["10% Service Charge and 6% Government Tax and non-commissionable.","9 Nights’ accommodation and daily breakfast except day 1.","Day trip to Genting Highlands with 2-way cable car ticket.","Full-day KL Grand Tour with National museum ticket.","Half Day Cable Car & Oriental Village Tour (Private Basis).","Half-Day Mangrove Tour with local lunch (Seat-In-Coach).","Half-day Penang Hill and Temple Tour with Funicular train ticket.","Meet & Assist upon Arrival at the Airport.","Return private airport transfer with driver by tour car/tour van."]

Title: Riyadh Heritage, Culture & History
Description: Explore the vibrant capital of Saudi Arabia in this 5-day city escape that beautifully blends old-world charm with modern marvels. From ancient souqs and historic forts to UNESCO World Heritage villages and iconic desert architecture, this package offers a deep dive into Riyadh’s cultural heartbeat. Ideal for history lovers, cultural explorers, and curious travelers seeking authentic Arabian experiences.

Title: BEST OF OMAN: MUSCAT, DESERT & MOUNTAINS
Description: Discover the best of Oman on this 6-day journey combining culture, coast, desert, and mountains. Explore Muscat’s iconic landmarks, enjoy a dolphin-watching cruise, and follow the scenic coastal route to Wahiba Sands for an unforgettable desert experience. Continue to the cool heights of Jabal Akhdar, visit traditional villages, and explore Nizwa’s historic souk and fort before returning to Muscat.
